item.title: Reclaim
item.description: At the beginning of the year, I’ve started an experiment with reclaiming my time from social networks. Besides setting time limits to Instagram and Twitter apps on the phone, I’ve also deleted facebook application, unfollowed everyone in facebook and deleted all my content there. I was pretty surprised with the results I’ve got. Previously, I often found myself reloading FB feed to get new or missed posts. That now makes absolutely no sense, as I always see “No new posts.
